RelatedSentence: The meeting was attended by Chief of Army Staff ( COAS ) General Raheel Sharif , Afghan Chief of General Staff Sher Muhammad Karimi and ISAF Commander General Joseph Dunford .

A1: the current security situation in Afghanistan
RelatedSentence: Participants reviewed the current security situation in Afghanistan .
Afghan military officials also briefed the Pakistani delegation over latest security situation in Afghanistan with special emphasis on Afghan Presidential elections .
